com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base

Interface HasIcon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccordionGroup, AddOn, Button, DateBoxAppended, DateTimeBoxAppended, Dropdown, DropdownBase, DropdownButton, DropdownContainer, DropdownSubmenu, DropdownTab, IconAnchor, NavbarButton, NavLink, NavWidget, SplitDropdownButton, Tab, TabLink, ThumbnailLink, TimeBoxAppended

    public interface HasIcon
    Interface for widgets that have icons.
    Since:
    2.0.4.0
    Author:
    Dominik Mayer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setBaseIcon(BaseIconType type)
      Sets the BaseType of the Icon.
      void setCustomIconStyle(String customIconStyle)
      Set custom icon style.

      Sets the Type of the Icon.
      void setIconPosition(IconPosition position)
      Set icon position , left or right
      void setIconSize(IconSize size)
      Sets the size of the icon.

      • setIconSize

        void setIconSize(IconSize size)
        Sets the size of the icon.

        Default is DEFAULT.

        Parameters:
        size - the new size.

      • setCustomIconStyle

        void setCustomIconStyle(String customIconStyle)
        Set custom icon style.

        It sets css class name to <i> tag. You can set any icons style.

        Parameters:
        customIconStyle -

      • setIconPosition

        void setIconPosition(IconPosition position)
        Set icon position , left or right
        Parameters:
        position - icon's position
